extendedInfo.description: A burger-serving game is coming now for your best enjoyment in a free version with the Magma Mobileâs touch! You are hired in a chain restaurant to serve clients as fast as possible to earn money and even tips for yourself. Take orders from your customers and make a recipe among sandwiches, garnishes, desserts and sodas. The more you will play, the more ingredients will appear in the fast-food! Take up the challenge and try the Career Mode to cope with a higher difficulty each day of the year! Work from Monday to Saturday and reach your goal to get more money and new ingredients for the service. Then if you are a great employee, you will even unlock a lot of achievements!Time is money! Try also to do your best in the Time Attack Mode to collect a maximum of coins within the time limit!This time management game will definitely entertain and challenge you and your family!Features of Burger:-Ingredientsâ list : bread, meat, lettuce, tomato, cheese, onion, cucumber, mayonnaise, tomato ketchup, bacon, fish, muffins, ice creams, french fries, potatoes and sodas-More than 300 levels and 40 achievements for burgerâs maniacSo come play Burger and become the master king of burgers!

reviews.title: Best food game ever!!
reviews.comment: This one of the best fast food game ever it really seem like ur workin 4 a fast food place hw fast u have 2 read the order then u make it quick nd sent it off nd. Ready 4 the next order
reviews.author: Joann Bennett

reviews.comment: Great sound, animation, graphics, but takes a while to start getting challenging.\tThe animation, graphics and sound are delightful, but the game takes hours before it starts to get challenging.. I usually beat the required goal by 250 -  280%.

reviews.comment: It\'s a really great game overall but the sensitivity to touch can be improved. It could be the hitboxes or just my phone/fingers

reviews.title: Serious fun!
reviews.comment: Well developed and quick paced, smooth gameplay. Far better than similar type games. Hope to see more features in the future.

reviews.comment: Fun addictive needs more variety in cooking area selection buttons are a little to close together and sometimes hard to press on smaller phones but other than that its fun!

reviews.comment: I\'m enjoying those game very much,recently started but I believe a fun game\t.
reviews.author: Maria Weaver

reviews.title: Too easy
reviews.comment: Great game but painfully easy. 5 year olds might find it challenging, just*maybe*. Usually get everything in 20 seconds and sit around for 40 + seconds for the round to end. Been playing for a long time waiting for it to get even a *little* bit challenging, but its still as easy as it was in the first round.
reviews.author: Shaheeda Zahir

reviews.title: Love this crazy game!
reviews.comment: Finally reached the highest achievement level (finally!!) I have never made so many crazy burger combos.  Great boredom killer. Excellent way to keep your memory and focus sharp!  (Samsung Galaxy Note 2)
reviews.author: Jennipher Williams
